column1: syntax: setup_2017_2016_vXY: only the last two digits XY will change, prefix is the branch name
setup_2017_2016_v00: this is the base version for setup_2017_2016 branch
setup_2017_2016_v01: * switched off the CA15 jets,
* switched on the AK8 gen jets in jetTree.
* Added new b-jet regression files from Deepak (he took from Twiki)

column3: * tup;les deleted without using, bjet regression file was wrong

column1: setup_2017_2016_v02: * added the duMMy varibale for genjet for data
* this is essentially same as setup_2017_2016_v01 but it works without error on data also (for gen jet part).
setup_2017_2016_v03: * changes on top of setup_2017_2016_v02

column3: * this can be used for both data and MC

column1: setup_2017_2016_v04: * added l1 prefire weights for 2017 and 2016 era using the recipe from https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/L1ECALPrefiringWeightRecipe

column3: * added chs met and track met for cross-checks.
* turned off the 2016 and 2017 switch to FASLE by default, this is necessary for proper functioning of the code.

column1: setup_2017_2016_v05 * added the event counter histogrsm to monitor if the total data is processed or not.
setup_2017_2016_v06 * no extra correction for jets

column3: * no pfMET process which we do not use
* fixed the AK4 jet collection label

column1: setup_2017_2016_v07 * removed the JER from jet and use type1Corr met
setup_2017_2016_v10 * added support for signal samples produced with randamized parameter
setup_2017_2016_v11 * added JEC sources uncertainty for 2016 and 2017
